name: LEGEND: ALAN SHEARER
description: Our unique infographic football print documents one of the country's and Newcastle United's greatest ever strikers: Alan Shearer. Includes all the stats from a legendary Newcastle United career, including player appearances, goals scored and classic games. An ideal gift for all Newcastle fans. Our products are hand screen printed on 270gsm acid-free & archival paper, to create a unique quality that only screen printing provides. The print size is approximately 25.4cm x 50.8cm (10" x 20"). Framed size 28cm x 53.5m (11" x 21") We are now offering a framing service on all our prints, black wooden frame with portrait fixings ready to hang. Please select from the drop-down menu. Unframed prints will be sent in a strong postal tube. In the UK, we use the Post Office Recorded Delivery service. We aim to deliver within 7 working days. For more information please select contact. Click here to join our mailing list to be the first to hear when new prints are available © 2013 The Beautiful Game

name: MANCHESTER UNITED: Nineteen
description: Our unique infographic football print documents Manchester United's march to a historic 19th title. The 2010-11 season will be etched in the memory of Manchester United fans for years to come. It was the season where they became league champions for a record nineteenth time. Includes all the stats from the season, including player appearances, goals scored, top goalscorer and many more. An ideal gift for all Manchester United fans. Our products are hand screen printed on 270gsm acid-free & archival paper, to create a unique quality that only screen printing provides. The print size is approximately 25.4cm x 50.8cm (10" x 20").
